nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils

Class ContactHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils.ContactHelper

  • public class ContactHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for contacts
    WARN: Be aware that this helper doesn't access the services through the security layer. They are all local services.
    Author:
    luis
